recipe.title: Almond Aioli
instructions: Purée almonds, oil, salt, and 1/2 cup water in a high-powered blender on high speed until thick, light, and smooth, about 3 minutes.
Do Ahead Aioli can be made 2 days ahead. Cover and chill. Thin with water if needed.
